TheVixenMod:SereneGrace.NAME: Serene Grace
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yBurn to an enemy, reduce that enemy's strength by half the amount of burn applied until end of turn.

TheVixenMod:FiriumZ.NAME: Firium Z
TheVixenMod:FiriumZ.FLAVOR: Obtained in a fierce... dance competition.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click: Once per combat, deal damage equal to all damage dealt to all enemies this turn to target enemy. It cannot die this turn.

TheVixenMod:Charcoal.NAME: Charcoal
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage caused by Burn is doubled (the debuff you inflict, not the status card).

TheVixenMod:FlameOrb.NAME: Flame Orb
TheVixenMod:FlameOrb.FLAVOR: You need real guts to carry something like this around.
DESCRIPTIONS: Burn is now halved instead of removed at the end of turn. Double the Block gained from Guts.

TheVixenMod:ShellBell.NAME: Shell Bell
TheVixenMod:ShellBell.FLAVOR: Reverberates when others scream in agony.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal damage to a burned creature, gain 3 Block.

TheVixenMod:TwistedSpoon.NAME: Twisted Spoon
TheVixenMod:TwistedSpoon.FLAVOR: Not to be confused with a strange spoon.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever your cards cause enemies to deal damage to themselves, they lose 2 Strength this turn.

TheVixenMod:Synchronize.NAME: Synchronize
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are afflicted with Weak, Vulnerable or temporary Strengthloss, also apply it to the enemy that applied it. NL (apply it to all enemies but for half the amount if you apply it to yourself)

TheVixenMod:UmbreonRelic.NAME: Umbreon's Support
TheVixenMod:UmbreonRelic.FLAVOR: Unbreakable bonds of friendship... that will be forgotten when you start another climb.
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing 20 cards, put Umbreon into your hand. It stays there until played or discarded manually.
